name: Trust The Game
description:
This is a small little platformer game, based on the theme "The Game is A Liar" from community Game Jam.
It is a hard platformer. However, every level has been tested and is possible to complete.
If you want to see all levels, the levels tab is here !
Want to do a full playthrough ? Click play ! Also includes a tutorial !

NB: some door triggers can have trouble launching...keep pressing F and jump around !
